title: Perform Emergency Alert System (EAS) Test
description: An agent must perform a scheduled test of the Wireless Emergency Alert system for a specific region.

tasks.description: Verify the scheduled time and geographic area for the EAS test.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the test parameters from the schedule.

tasks.description: Broadcast the standardized test message to all cell towers in the designated area.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully executes the broadcast command.

tasks.description: Monitor the system logs to confirm successful transmission from all towers.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent verifies that all towers in the area successfully sent the test alert.
